short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go from a GitHub page to the CircleCI workflows page for the repository

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you are on a github repository page, this add-on will add a page action to your address bar. When you click on this page action, it will take you to the Circle CI workflows page for the github repository that you were on.

This add-on is open source software. You can find the code on GitHub:

https://github.com/icyflame/open-circleci-workflows-firefox
